description: This file defines CMake functions for converting JSON strings to CMake-compatible strings, handling escape sequences and quotation marks.

methods.name: json_string_to_cmake
methods.description: Converts a JSON string into a CMake string, removing quotes and handling escape sequences.

methods.name: json_string_ref_to_cmake
methods.description: Wraps json_string_to_cmake for a reference to a JSON string.
